name: @devoto13/ng-toast
author: Yaroslav Admin <devoto13@gmail.com>
description: Toasts for Angular, highly inspired by https://github.com/tameraydin/ngToast.

scripts.build:es2015: ngc -p tsconfig-build.json && rollup build/ng-toast.js -o dist/ng-toast.js -f es -e '@angular/core,@angular/common'
scripts.build:es5: ngc -p tsconfig-es5.json && rollup build/ng-toast.js -o dist/ng-toast.es5.js -f es -e '@angular/core,@angular/common'
